content: The enhanced ionic conductivity of the pellets spark plasma-sintered at 700 and 750 degree C directly translates into a drop in overpotential of the cell from 0.44 V for the conventional cell to 0.34 eV for the 700 degree C sample and to 0.27 V for the 750 degree C sample, all at a moderate current density of 0.08 mA cm−2.
